issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KitchenSink, Base UI>Views>Dashboard view, I entered the test in landscape mode and the dashboard view had opened in portrat mode. Entering test in portrait mode and rotating device does not change orientation, it keeps portrait mode. Also Views button can be pressed from landscape, and layout will be changed respectively.
Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on device
2) Rotate device to Landscape orientation
3) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Dashboard view
4) Launch test
Result:
Portrait mode
Expected:
Icons should appear in landscape mode.
Notes:
*not a regression, occurs in 2.1.3*
*This does not occur on iPad mini, only on iPad2,3,4*
fields.summary: Kitchensink: Base UI>Views>Dashboard view, launching test in landscape mode causes  dashboard being open in portrait mode
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.0.201210301422
Titanium SDK, build: 2.1.4.v20121030173408
Devices:
iPad mini iOS 6.0.1
iPad4 iOS 6.0

comments.body:
*Now when I am testing KS against 3.0.0 this bug occurs on iPad mini as well.*
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.0.201211131839
Titanium SDK, build: 3.0.0.v20121113170203
Devices:
iPad mini iOS 6.0.1
iPad4 iOS 6.0

Issue exist with release 3.1.0 and 3.0.2  
tested on

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.2.201302191606
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
